structure.unit: E IMPLEMENTATION OF FEDERAL HAZARDOUS MATERIALS PROGRAMS

law.catch_line: Response to be consistent with plan.
law.text: After the state commission approves plans developed by each local emergency planning committee, emergency response organizations of each city, county, urban-county government, and charter county government shall respond in a manner consistent with those plans.
law.history: Created 1998 Ky. Acts ch. 226, sec. 73, effective July 15, 1998.
